name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
description: The definitive collection of the Halo series, featuring remastered versions of several titles in the iconic franchise.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: Build a resistance from virtually anyone you see as you hack, infiltrate, and fight to take back a near-future London that is facing its downfall.

name: Sleeping Dogs
description: An open-world action-adventure set in Hong Kong, following an undercover cop's journey into the Sun On Yee Triad.

name: Saints Row 2
description: Rebuild the Saints and take back Stilwater in this open-world sandbox known for its blend of grit and over-the-top action.

name: Saints Row: The Third Remastered
description: The definitive version of the Third Street Saints' rise to power, featuring enhanced graphics and all DLC.

name: Saints Row IV: Re-Elected
description: The President of the United States must save Earth from an alien invasion using superpowers and strange weaponry.

name: Saints Row (Reboot)
description: A fresh start for the series set in the vibrant city of Santo Ileso, focusing on the birth of a new criminal empire.

name: Left 4 Dead
description: A cooperative first-person shooter where survivors must fight through hordes of zombies to reach safety.

name: Left 4 Dead 2
description: The sequel to the hit co-op horror FPS, adding new characters, infected types, and melee weapons.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: In an era where Machines roam the land and mankind is no longer the dominant species, a young hunter named Aloy embarks on a journey to discover her destiny.

name: FIFA 14
description: Experience the emotion of scoring great goals with realistic ball physics and authentic stadium atmospheres.

name: FIFA 16
description: Innovating across the entire pitch, delivering a balanced, authentic, and exciting football experience.

name: FIFA 17
description: Powered by Frostbite, introducing 'The Journey' story mode and transformed physical play.

name: FIFA 20
description: Breaking new ground with the VOLTA Football street mode and overhauled ball motion mechanics.

name: FIFA 21
description: Win as one in FIFA 21 with new ways to team up and express yourself on the street and in the stadium.

name: FIFA 23
description: The final EA Sports FIFA title, featuring HyperMotion2 Technology and both men's and women's World Cup modes.
